net.ssehub.comani.analysis.variabilitychange.diff

Class FileDiff

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ssehub.comani.analysis.variabilitychange.diff.FileDiff
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildFileDiff, ModelFileDiff, OtherFileDiff, SourceFileDiff

    public abstract class FileDiff
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class represents a general file diff. It implements common attributes and methods for the following sub-classes:
    • ModelFileDiff
    • BuildFileDiff
    • SourceFileDiff
    • OtherFileDiff
    Author:
    Christian Kroeher

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileDiff.FileType
      Enumeration for defining the type of file diff for a specific object.

      The full, line-wise diff description of a commit.

      The FileDiff.FileType of this file diff.
      protected static java.lang.String LINE_ADDED_MARKER
      String identifying an added line in a diff text, if found at the start of the line.
      protected static java.lang.String LINE_DELETED_MARKER
      String identifying a deleted line in a diff text, if found at the start of the line.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected FileDiff(FileDiff.FileType fileType, java.lang.String[] diffLines, int changesStartLineNum)
      Construct a new FileDiff.

      This constructor will start a line-wise analysis of the given diff lines calling the abstract method isVariabilityChange(String, int).

      • fileType

        protected java.lang.String[] diffLines
        The full, line-wise diff description of a commit.

      • changesStartLine

        protected int changesStartLine
        The line number at which the first change of a commit is described. This typically is the first occurrence of a line starting with "@@".

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileDiff

        protected FileDiff(FileDiff.FileType fileType,
                   java.lang.String[] diffLines,
                   int changesStartLineNum)
        Construct a new FileDiff.

        This constructor will start a line-wise analysis of the given diff lines calling the abstract method isVariabilityChange(String, int). This method is implemented in the specific file diff classes to detect changes to the variability information available in the specific type of file diff.
        Parameters:
        fileType - the FileDiff.FileType of this file diff
        diffLines - the full, line-wise diff description of a commit
        changesStartLineNum - the line number at which the first change of a commit is described (typically the first occurrence of a line staring with "@@")

    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        protected abstract java.lang.String normalize(java.lang.String diffLine,
                                              int diffLinePosition)
        Normalize the given diff line, e.g. remove leading "+" or "-", check if the line is a general comment or contains general comments as part of the line.
        Parameters:
        diffLine - the line of a diff description to be normalized
        diffLinePosition - the index of the given diff line in diffLines used, e.g., for backtracking
        Returns:
        the normalized diff line without leading "+" or "-"; in case of comments, only the non-comment part will be return, which may lead to an empty string

      • isVariabilityChange

        protected abstract boolean isVariabilityChange(java.lang.String cleanDiffLine,
                                               int cleanDiffLinePosition)
        Check if the given diff line (without leading "+" or "-") describes a change to variability information. The result of this check depends on the possible variability definitions in the specific file type and, thus, has to be implemented in each class derived from this class (see FileDiff.

        Please note that returning true results in increasing the added or removed variability line number (counter).
        Parameters:
        cleanDiffLine - the line of a diff description to be checked for variability information without leading "+" or "-"
        cleanDiffLinePosition - the index of the given diff line in diffLines used, e.g., for backtracking
        Returns:
        true if the given diff line contains variability information, false otherwise
